title: My Superstar
description:
Description :
        Mi Yuan's father has a car accident and turns into vegetative state. She needs a lot of money, so she gets into the show biz and becomes an assistant to Wei Qian, a notorious actress. Mi Yuan works for Wei Qian with caution and finds out that she is not like what everyone thinks of her. Then two award-winning actors, Huo Mingqi and Zhuo Yijun, walk into Mi Yuan's peaceful life. They are totally different people. Who is her Mr. Right?

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 4: I Hit My Prince Charming Ii
